ch0118_40_lillie/0101_0701_02_10:
It’s the start of a brand-new day! Let’s give it 
our all!
ch0118_40_lillie/7101_0701_01_10:
What do you think of this outfit? It’s a traditional
kind of clothing that’s usually worn in Johto!
ch0118_40_lillie/7101_0701_03_10:
When I give directions like that to my partner,
the sleeves flutter! Isn’t it great?!
ch0118_40_lillie/7102_0701_01_10:
Have you decided what your New Year’s
resolution is going to be?
ch0118_40_lillie/7102_0701_02_10:
My resolution is to use maximum effort in
everything I do!
ch0118_40_lillie/7102_0701_03_10: Watch me as I try new things!
ch0118_40_lillie/7103_0701_01_10: Ribombee’s pollen puffs are full of nutrition!
ch0118_40_lillie/7103_0701_02_10:
She shares them with me, so I’m always full
of energy!
ch0118_40_lillie/7104_0701_01_10:
When you look at the details, you can really see
how hard the designer worked on this outfit!
ch0118_40_lillie/7104_0701_02_10: Isn’t this flower in my hair really nice, too?
ch0118_40_lillie/7104_0701_03_10:
Ribombee sometimes mistakes it for a real flower
and flies up to rest on it!
ch0118_40_lillie/7105_0701_01_10:
There’s something I’m going to challenge myself
to do! It’ll be a fresh start for a new year!
ch0118_40_lillie/7105_0701_02_10:
I’m going to turn my diary of my adventures into
a book!
ch0118_40_lillie/7105_0701_03_10:
I’ll be sure to write a lot about you, too, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0118_40_lillie/7105_0701_04_10: I’ll ask you some questions later, OK?
ch0118_40_lillie/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, great timing! Here, this is for you!
ch0118_40_lillie/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s just something small, but I hope it comes in
handy when you’re out on your adventures!
ch0118_40_lillie/2501_0701_01_10: Is there anything you really love but are bad at?
ch0118_40_lillie/2501_0701_02_10: For me, it’s sewing. I gave it a try, but...
ch0118_40_lillie/2501_0701_03_10:
It really didn’t turn out well. I couldn’t do it as
well as my brother can...
ch0118_40_lillie/2501_0702_01_10:
That said, I’m still glad I tried doing something I
wasn’t sure I’d be good at.
ch0118_40_lillie/2501_0702_02_10:
Because now I know how much work designers
have to put into making these clothes!
ch0118_40_lillie/2501_0702_03_10:
I’m gonna keep doing my best at what I’m good
at so I can make people happy the way this outfit
does me!
ch0118_40_lillie/2511_0701_01_10:
There’s no such thing as “too late” when you’re
trying something new.
ch0118_40_lillie/2511_0701_02_10:
Compared to my friends, it took me a long time to
become a Pokémon Trainer.
ch0118_40_lillie/2511_0701_03_10: But everyone was really nice about it!
ch0118_40_lillie/2511_0702_01_10:
You were also very kind to me when I first came
to Pasio.
ch0118_40_lillie/2511_0702_02_10: I’m so lucky to have such great friends!
ch0118_40_lillie/2511_0702_03_10: I’m so grateful! Thank you so much!
ch0118_40_lillie/3001_0701_01_10:
When I wake up in the morning and feel the
sunshine hit my face, all of my sleepiness just
floats away.
ch0118_40_lillie/3003_0701_01_10:
Pasio is a lovely place, isn’t it?
Everyone is so very kind here.
ch0118_40_lillie/3005_0701_01_10:
Did you have a good day today?
Fingers crossed that tomorrow will be
a good day, too!
